casebody.data:
STATE
v.
Lemuel SHERMAN. No. 313PA07. Supreme Court of North Carolina. April 10, 2008. William J. Thomas, II, Durham, for Sherman. David Saacks, District Attorney, for State.

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 6th day of July 2007 by Attorney General for Expedited Hearing:

"Motion Dismissed as moot by order of the Court in conference this the 10th day of April 2008."
